title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\OSPolicy\Resource\ExecResource\Exec
name: Exec
description:
A file or script to execute.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.OSPolicy.Resource.ExecResource.Exec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.script
params.description: An inline script. The size of the script is limited to 1024 characters.

params.name: data.args
params.description: Optional arguments to pass to the source during execution.

params.name: data.output_file_path
params.description: Only recorded for enforce Exec. Path to an output file (that is created by this Exec) whose content will be recorded in OSPolicyResourceCompliance after a successful run. Absence or failure to read this file will result in this ExecResource being non-compliant. Output file size is limited to 100K bytes.
